column2: Many people who stand opposed to the Federation have abandoned their hometowns and fled here to Cornelia. Do you think that could be the reason that the Bahamutian Army has become so much more aggressive lately?
The goblins may have no one left to lead them now, but they’re still living in the plains, right? I just hope they keep their distance and stay far away from the town...
At least we have a legendary Champion with us, so Cornelia should be safe... Right?
It must have been the Champion and his allies who chased away those strange machines!
